availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Isabelle Elizabeth Carpenter. Father of Sarah Frances Suttles, Isaac S. Suttles, Martha Susan Suttles, Elizabeth Jane Suttles, Daniel Suttles, Uriah Suttles, Mary A. Suttles, James F. Suttles, Eliza Suttles, Lucy Ann Suttles, and Willis Suttles. Farmer in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Northern District, p. 185A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 566.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 4, p. 71A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 11453.
